mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_ID, USER_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID FROM TB_NOTICE ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC
SELECT NOTICE_ID, USER_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE ( NOTICE_ID, USER_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_ID.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{createdId}, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{createdId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{noticeTitle}, NOTICE_CONTENT = #{noticeContent}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSTIMESTAMP, UPDATED_ID = #{updatedId} WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
